title: Defining Axis of Symmetry
text: The axis of symmetry for a vertically oriented parabola is a vertical line dividing the parabola into two equal halves.

title: Calculating Axis of Symmetry
text: The value of the axis of symmetry is the x-coordinate of the vertex.

title: Formula for X-Coordinate
text: To find the x-coordinate of the vertex, use the formula $$\frac{-b}{2} a$$ when the equation is in general form.
